explains: n. 亲属关系，家属关系；亲切感，亲近感；共同特征，共同起源

sentences.en: The ties of kinship may have helped the young man find his way in life.
sentences.cn: 亲情可能帮这个年轻人找到了生活的方向。

sentences.en: Kinship is unilateral while friendship and love are bilateral.
sentences.cn: 亲情是单方面的，而友情和爱情是双方面的。

sentences.en: These same sensations also cause mammals to develop various types of social relations and kinship networks.
sentences.cn: 这些相同的感觉也使哺乳动物发展出多种社会关系和亲属网络。
